description: Full texts of the 85 Federalist Papers as available on the mentioned URL, including all documents authored by Alexander Hamilton, James Madison, and John Jay.
The 85 papers are grouped in 9 HTML files (e.g. text-1-10.html)

Research Guides: Federalist Papers: Primary Documents in American History: Introduction. (n.d.). Library of Congress Research Guides. Retrieved August 9, 2023, from https://guides.loc.gov/federalist-papers/introduction
